resources.string: Please check your internet connection and try again.
Found an update database file. Do you want to update file?
The internet connection is needed for the updating.
Process has been started. You can track the process on the statusbar.
Your choice movie will be deleted. Are you sure?
Your choice TV show will be deleted. Are you sure?
Do you really want to clear the cache?
Movie has been added. Details will be updated automatically.
TV show has been added. Details will be updated automatically.
Your choice movie will be deleted. Are you sure?
Your choice custom list will be deleted. Are you sure?
You should download GrieeX Pro to use this function!
The database will be uploaded on Dropbox. Are you sure?
The database will be imported from Dropbox and changed with your current database. Are you sure?
You are on the maximum record limits on the free version of GrieeX. You should download GrieeX Pro to add more records!
Please select a valid backup file!
If you like GrieeX, please rate us only in a few minutes. Thank you for your support.
Press back again to exit application
Comments must be at least 5 words.
Movie was added to the database previously. Are you sure you want to continue?
When you want to get notified for an episode
Your choice season will be deleted. Are you sure?
Login in failed. Please try again.
Sign in to through the Trakt website and give GrieeX access to your account
Unable to fetch token, please try again
Trakt has encountered a server error, please try again
